entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sechelt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:48 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sechelt 10:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 4.5°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia in the evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
